modName: Dropping Items with R key Fixed
summary: Can's drop your items with R key? This mod will fix it!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#1155Cc][size=5][b]1. DESCRIPTION[/b][/size][/color]


Can's drop your items with R button? This mod will fix it!


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]2. FEATURES[/size][/b][/color]


By default you drop items with R key. But if you change your Ready Weapon/Sheath Weapon button you will stop items with that key. This mod puts "dropping command" to it's own section, not linked with Ready Weapon/Sheath Weapon button.


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]3. CHANGELOG[/size][/b][/color]


v.1.0.1 (23.11.2012)
          • Fixed: players couldn't equip weapon with left mouse button

v1.0 (12.02.2012)
          • Release


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]4. INSTALLATION[/size][/b][/color]


AUTOMATIC (with NMM):
just click DOWNLOAD WITH MANAGER and after downloading just install it

MANUAL:
extract content of rar file to <SKYRIMINSTALLFOLDER>/Data


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]5. NOTES[/size][/b][/color]


• report bugs;
• comment


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]6. MY OTHER MODS[/size][/b][/color]

author: G-Phoenix

files.name: R-key Drop Items Fix v1_1
files.changelogHtml: Fixed: Bug with equipping weapons with LMB (Left Mouse Button)
